title: Ibn Khaldun on the Mamluks Primary SAQ

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Identify ONE claim that the author makes about the Mamluks in the first paragraph. Identify ONE way the passage illustrates the political situation of the Islamic world in the period before circa 1450. Explain ONE way the passage could be used to illustrate differences in forms of coerced labor in the period before circa 1750.
